name: Im-Punched
description:
Programming - Evan Youssef

Art - William Johnson

Note* Menus can only be navigated with the mouse

- Player 1 controls -

Keyboard: Movement - Arrow keys, Jump - P, Attack - O, Special Attack - 1, Shield - U

Controller: Movement - Left stick, Jump - X/Y, Attack - B, Special Attack - A, Shield - Shoulder buttons

- Player 2 controls -

Keyboard: Movement - WASD, Jump V, Attack - B, Special Attack - N, Shield - M
